interpretation:
The "woman and man holding hands" card represents a strong and loving connection between two people. It signifies a deep bond that brings both emotional and physical fulfillment. This card can indicate the presence of a romantic partner, a close friend, or even a family member who is a source of support and comfort.

The "woman and man holding hands" card suggests that the querent should cherish and nurture their relationships with loved ones. It encourages the cultivation of open communication and mutual respect. This card can also indicate the need for compromise and cooperation in a relationship.
